original_text: Besides the cakes, he shall offer for his offering leavened bread with the sacrifice of thanksgiving of his peace offerings.
korean_text: 또 유교병을 화목제의 감사제물과 함께 그 예물로 드리되

sentences.original_text: he shall offer for his offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 제물을 위해 드릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: of thanksgiving of his peace offerings
